r.d: RFC2518 compliant stream wrapper that allows to use WebDAV server resources like a regular file system from within PHP.
r.n: - advance writer position in stream_write() (Bug #2463) - analyzed bugs #1044 and #1045, actual cause is in HTTP_Request, needs to be fixed there (see Bug #1045 for progress) - fixed package dependency bug (HTTP_Request instead of HTTP)
